concept.title: Creating Your First Mini Table of Contents
concept.shortdesc: In this example, you are going to add the style “Title w_Mini TOC” as an output class to the title of this section “Mini Table of Contents for Mobile Devices.”

conbody.p: Adding this output will add a mini Table of Contents underneath this title in the generated output. The mini Table of Contents is a good way for a content creator to increase the navigation features of their output for a mobile audience, or a quick way to jump to sections within a topic.
